name: Delta Legends
description:
△elta Legends

Game name: Delta Legends

Game genre: 3D third-person Fantasy Musical Adventure

Game mechanics: exploration, rhythm  action, creature cards.

                           Keywords: Environment, Pollution, Swamp, Species

Delta Legends is an urban folktale where the main character, Hu-Mo has to help Delta Kingdom to prevail and win against their biggest enemy, The Imbalance Monster. Delta Legends video game is still in development and will be launched next year.

History: Long time ago, people lived in harmony with the nature. In Bucharest, one of the most polluted cities of Romania, there is a place called Delta Văcărești. President Nicolae Ceaușescu wanted to build a water reservoir and as a result he created a concrete dam to surround the lake. Somehow, he couldn’t finish his project so the place remained forgotten and became the dump of the town. Years later, the nature bloomed and many species flourished within the confines of the dam. The biodiversity encountered there is considered by some to be comparable to that of a small river delta.

How to play:

W,A,S,D or arrows for walking

Shift + W,A,S,D for running

Space for jumping

Tips: Don't move the player when interacting with other characters (use click only to press Next)
